title: Monday Post Show (04-19-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (04-19-21)
description:
Bobby showcases his sherbet shirt and talks about having a weekend at home and going out in doing things now that he’s fully vaccinated. He went to a spin class and was embarrassed to print his Peloton shoes into a competitor class. Then went to lunch in sweaty clothes right after. Bobby reviews two movies “Judas and the Black Messiah” and “The Last Blockbuster”. He also gives an update on his house repair situation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
